Grilled Chicken Fajitas

chicken
grilled
mexican

Ingredients

Marinade

  • 1/4 cup olive oil
  • 2 tbsp Taco Seasoning (see recipes)
  • zest of half a lime (optional)

Chicken Fajitas

  • 3 Chicken Thighs

Fixings

  • Tortillas
  • Avocado
  • Cheese (monterey jack, medium cheddar, or colby jack)
  • Grilled onion
  • Grilled Bell Pepper

Procedure

  1. Combine marinade in ziploc bag
  2. Add chicken thighs
  3. Let marinate for at least 30 minutes to 2 hours
  4. When coals are hot, pour onto one side of the grill so there is a hot side and cool side.
  5. Remove chicken from marinade and remove any extra moisture from chicken
  6. Place chicken directly over coals on the hot side of the grill for 3 minutes per side
  7. If chicken is not up to 165 internal temp, move to cool side of the grill until target temp reached.
  8. If grilling bell pepper/onion, place directly over coals and cook until desired level of char is reached
  9. slice bell pepper and roughly chop grilled onion.
  10. Slice chicken into strips
  11. Assemble fajitas, enjoy
